meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joyce Lynch Carter Spires Ricky Young Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7277.

td.p: Joyce Lynch, a water exercise instructor from Austin, Texas
Carter Spires, a law student originally from Birmingham, Alabama
Ricky Young, a tax accountant originally from Canyonville, Oregon (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,000)

tr.td: POP MUSIC
BRIDGES
THREE OF A KIND
NATIVE AMERICANS
ONLY "O" AS A VOWEL
KNOT THE TIE
